                                                                # åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®

                                                                npx webpack or webpack

                                                                /* webpack.config.js */

const path = require("node:path")

module.exports = {
  // å…¥å£
  entry: "./src/main.js",
  
  // å‡ºå£
  output: {
    path: path.resolve(__dirname, "dist"),
    filename: "static/js/main.js",
    clean: true // è‡ªåŠ¨æ¸…ç©ºä¸Šæ¬¡æ‰“åŒ…èµ„æº
  },
  
  // åŠ è½½å™¨
  module: {
    rules: []
  },
  
  // æ’ä»¶
  plugins: [],
  
  // æ¨¡å¼
  mode: "development" // or "production"
}

                                                                # Loader

                                                                # å¤„ç†æ ·å¼èµ„æº

                                                                npm i style-loader css-loader -D

                                                                npm i less-loader -D

                                                                npm i sass-loader -D

                                                                /* webpack.config.js */

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,
        use: ["style-loader", "css-loader"]
      },
      {
        test: /\.less$/,
        use: ["style-loader", "css-loader", "less-loader"]
      },
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/,
        use: ["style-loader", "css-loader", "sass-loader"]
      }
    ]
  }
}

                                                                # å¤„ç†å›¾ç‰‡èµ„æº

                                                                åœ¨ Webpack4 ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡ url-loader å’Œ file-loader å¯¹å›¾ç‰‡èµ„æºè¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ï¼Œ

                                                                è€Œ Webpack5 å·²ç»å†…ç½®äº†è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ª loaderï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦ç®€å•çš„é…ç½®å°±è¡Œäº†ã€‚

                                                                /* webpack.config.js */

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.(png|jpe?g|gif|webp)$/,
        type: "asset",
        parser: {
          // ä¼˜åŒ–
          dataUrlCondition: {
            maxSize: 10 * 1024 // å°äº 10kb çš„å›¾ç‰‡ä¼šè¢«å¤„ç†æˆ data URI (base64) æ ¼å¼
          }
        },
        generator: {
          filename: "static/imgs/[hash:8][ext][query]", // è¾“å‡ºè·¯å¾„åŠæ‰“åŒ…åçš„å›¾ç‰‡å
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}

                                                                # å¤„ç† Babel

                                                                npm i babel-loader @babel/core @babel/preset-env -D

                                                                npm i @babel/preset-react -D

                                                                npm i @babel/preset-typescript -D

                                                                /* babel.config.js */

module.exports = {
  // é¢„è®¾
  presets: [
    "@babel/preset-env", // å¤„ç† JS
    "@babel/preset-react", // å¤„ç† JSX
    "@babel/preset-typescript" // å¤„ç† TS
  ]
}

                                                                /* webpack.config.js */

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.js$/,
        exclude: /node_modules/, // æ’é™¤ node_modules ä»£ç ä¸ç¼–è¯‘
        loader: "babel-loader"
      }
    ]
  }
}

                                                                # æå– CSS æˆå•ç‹¬æ–‡ä»¶

                                                                npm i mini-css-extract-plugin -D

                                                                å°† CSS æ‰“åŒ…æˆå•ç‹¬çš„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ link æ ‡ç­¾åŠ è½½ã€‚è€Œä¸æ˜¯åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª style æ ‡ç­¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆæ ·å¼ã€‚

                                                                /* webpack.prod.js */

const MiniCssExtractPlugin = require("mini-css-extract-plugin")

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,
        use: [MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader, "css-loader"] // ä¸éœ€è¦ style-loader
      }
    ]
  },
  plugins: [
    new MiniCssExtractPlugin({
      filename: "static/css/main.css" // æŒ‡å®šè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶åå’Œç›®å½•
    })
  ]
}

                                                                # å¤„ç† CSS å…¼å®¹æ€§

                                                                npm i postcss-loader postcss postcss-preset-env -D

                                                                /* webpack.prod.js */

// è·å–å¤„ç†æ ·å¼çš„ loaders
const getStyleLoaders = (preProcessor) => {
  return [
    MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader,
    "css-loader",
    {
      loader: "postcss-loader",
      options: {
        postcssOptions: {
          plugins: [
            "postcss-preset-env" // èƒ½è§£å†³å¤§å¤šæ•°æ ·å¼å…¼å®¹æ€§é—®é¢˜
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    preProcessor
  ].filter(Boolean) // ç­›é€‰çœŸå€¼
}

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,
        use: getStyleLoaders()
      },
      {
        test: /\.less$/,
        use: getStyleLoaders("less-loader")
      },
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/,
        use: getStyleLoaders("sass-loader")
      }
    ]
  }
}

                                                                /* package.json */

{
  "browserslist": ["last 2 version", "> 1%", "not dead"] // ä¸å…¼å®¹ä½ç‰ˆæœ¬æµè§ˆå™¨
}

                                                                # å‹ç¼© CSS

                                                                npm i css-minimizer-webpack-plugin -D

                                                                /* webpack.prod.js */

const CssMinimizerPlugin = require("css-minimizer-webpack-plugin")

module.exports = {
  // ...
  plugins: [
    new CssMinimizerPlugin()
  ]
}

                                                                # Plugins

                                                                # å¤„ç† HTML

                                                                npm i html-webpack-plugin -D

                                                                /* webpack.config.js */

const HtmlWebpackPlugin = require("html-webpack-plugin")

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    plugins: [
      new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
        template: path.resolve(__dirname, "public/index.html") // æŒ‡å®šæºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ‰“åŒ…ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ª html æ–‡ä»¶
      })
    ]
  }
}

                                                                # å¤„ç† Eslint

                                                                npm i eslint-webpack-plugin eslint -D

                                                                /* .eslintrc.js */

module.exports = {
  // ç»§æ‰¿å…¶ä»–è§„åˆ™
  extends: ["eslint:recommended"],
  // ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
  env: {
    node: true, // å¯ç”¨ node ä¸­å…¨å±€å˜é‡
    browser: true // å¯ç”¨æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸­å…¨å±€å˜é‡
  },
  // è§£æé€‰é¡¹
  parserOptions: {
    ecmaVersion: 6, // ES è¯­æ³•ç‰ˆæœ¬
    sourceType: "module" // ES æ¨¡å—åŒ–
  },
  // å…·ä½“æ£€æŸ¥è§„åˆ™
  // æˆ‘ä»¬çš„è§„åˆ™ä¼šè¦†ç›–æ‰ç»§æ‰¿çš„è§„åˆ™ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æƒ³è¦ä¿®æ”¹è§„åˆ™ç›´æ¥æ”¹å°±æ˜¯äº†
  rules: {
    "no-var": "error", // ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ var å®šä¹‰å˜é‡
    "semi": "off" // ç¦æ­¢ä½¿ç”¨åˆ†å·
  }
  // ...
  // å…¶ä»–è§„åˆ™è¯¦è§ï¼šhttps://eslint.bootcss.com/docs/user-guide/configuring
}

                                                                /* webpack.config.js */

const ESLintWebpackPlugin = require("eslint-webpack-plugin")

module.exports = {
  // ...
  plugins: [
    new ESLintWebpackPlugin({
      context: path.resolve(__dirname, "src") // å‡ºå£
    })
  ]
}

                                                                # æ·»åŠ ç‰ˆæƒ

                                                                // webpack.config.js
const path = require('path')
const webpack = require('webpack')

module.exports = {
  entry: './src/main.js',
  output: {
    path: path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist'),
    filename: 'bundle.js'
  },
  plugins: [
    new webpack.BannerPlugin('æœ€ç»ˆç‰ˆæƒå½’ ** æ‰€æœ‰')
  ]
}

                                                                # å‹ç¼©

                                                                npm i terser-webpack-plugin -D

                                                                // webpack.congfig.js
const path = require('path')
const TerserWebpackPlugin = require("terser-webpack-plugin")

module.exports = {
  entry: './src/main.js',
  output: {
    path: path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist'),
    filename: 'bundle.js'
  },
  optimization: {
    minimize: true,
    minimizer: [new TerserWebpackPlugin()]
  }
}

                                                                # Vue

                                                                npm install vue-loader@15 vue-template-compiler --save-dev æŒ‡å®š 15 ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„ vue-loader

                                                                npm install @vue/compiler-sfc --save-dev

                                                                vue-loader è§£æ vue æ–‡ä»¶

                                                                vue-template-compiler è§£æ <template> æ¨¡æ¿

                                                                vue-compiler-sfc è§£æ <template> <script> <style> æ¨¡æ¿

                                                                const { VueLoaderPlugin } = require('vue-loader')

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.vue$/,
        use: ["vue-loader"]
      }
    ]
  },
  plugins: [
    new VueLoaderPlugin()
  ],
  resolve: {
    alias: {
      'vue$': 'vue/dist/vue.js'
    }
  }
}
